inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent for the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Elevated preoperative blood glucose of a value > 150 mg/dL or < 350 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline chemistry with a potassium at or above 3.5
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient does not give informed consent for the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient cannot understand or read English
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 17-year-old boy with symptoms of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills, and loss of appetite. He has no underlying disease and is not on any medications.
